001.name: Operator Portal
001.description: Asset Management and Monitoring System for Seaplane Group management, and its partner operators

002.name: Mile High Roller Club
002.description: A collection of non-fungible tokens built on the ethereum network. It's the official loyalty program of Seaplane Group. It consists of five (5) NFT tiers: Voyager, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum, with each tier offering different real-life utility values

003.name: APTI
003.description: Business website with Content Management System for Accel Prime Technologies, a computer parts retailer based in the Philippines.

004.name: PNP-eDPCR
004.description: Report Management System for the Philippine National Police - Directorate for Police Community Relations

005.name: Manda HIS
005.description: Hospital Information System for a government-controlled hospital in Mandaluyong, Philippines

006.name: DGCondo
006.description: Condominium Management System for DGCondo, a real estate operator based in the Philippines

007.name: PNP-LMS
007.description: Learning Management System for the Philippine National Police
